bales
2016/KER/33669
RAJA VIJAYARAGHAVAN.Y, J
Dated this the 1 day of August, 2016
ORDER
1.By order dated 27.6.2016 in Crl.M.C.No.2472/2016, the
order dismissing the application filed by the petitioners
seeking interim custody of a vehicle was set aside and the
learned Magistrate was directed to pass appropriate
orders for releasing the vehicle to the ist petitioner subject
to appropriate conditions. The grievance of the petitioners
is that in spite of specific orders being passed, the said
application has not been considered and disposed of till
date.
2.The learned counsel also submits that the said application
now stands posted to 9.8.2016. As per the earlier order
which is produced as Annexure-3, the Sub Inspector of
Police, Kasaba Police Station was also directed to report

gare]
BES,
2016/KER/33669
Crl.M.C.4844/2016 2
seizure of the vehicle before the learned Magistrate.
Having regard to the facts and circumstances, I direct the
learned Magistrate to pass orders as directed in Annexure-
3 on 9.8.2016 itself and grant interim custody of the
vehicle to the _ petitioners subject to appropriate
conditions.
Petition is disposed of as above.
Sd/-
RAJA VIJAYARAGHAVAN.Y.
JUDGE
